0100011010000111 1010111110100001 1 -> sum: 1111011000101001, cout: 0
0110010001001101 1100011010101010 0 -> sum: 0010101011110111, cout: 1
1001011110100101 1111000101100111 1 -> sum: 1000100100001101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
